Class LoanParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.entities.accounts.loans.LoanParameters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class LoanParameters
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Contains parameters on TransferTypes to configure loans
    Author:
    luis

    • Method Detail

      • calculateGrantFee

        public java.math.BigDecimal calculateGrantFee(java.math.BigDecimal amount)
        Calculates the grant fee to the given amount
        Returns:
        0 if no grant fee, the applied grant fee otherwise (ie: if grant fee = 3%, returns 30 for amount = 1000)

      • calculateLoanTotal

        public java.math.BigDecimal calculateLoanTotal(java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                                      int paymentCount,
                                      java.util.Calendar grantDate,
                                      java.util.Calendar firstExpirationDate,

      • calculateMonthlyInterests

        public java.math.BigDecimal calculateMonthlyInterests(java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                                             int paymentCount,
                                             java.util.Calendar grantDate,
                                             java.util.Calendar firstExpirationDate,
                                             java.math.MathContext mathContext)
        Calculates the monthly interests for the given parameters
        Returns:
        0 if no monthly interests, or the applied interests otherwise (ie: if monthly interests = 1%, paymentCount = 1 and delay = 0, returns 10 for amount = 1000)

      • calculatePaymentExpirationFee

        public java.math.BigDecimal calculatePaymentExpirationFee(java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                                                 int diff)
        Calculates the expiration fee, if any, for the given loan payment parameters
        Returns:
        0 if no expiration fee, the applied expiration fee otherwise (ie: if expiration fee = 3%, returns 3 for amount = 100)

      • calculatePaymentExpirationInterest

        public java.math.BigDecimal calculatePaymentExpirationInterest(java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                                                      int diff,
                                                      java.math.MathContext mathContext)
        Calculates the expiration daily interest, if any, for the given loan payment parameters
        Returns:
        0 if no interest, the applied interest otherwise (ie: if expiration daily interest fee = 1%, on 5 days after expiration, returns 1 for amount = 100)

      • calculatePaymentTotal

        public java.math.BigDecimal calculatePaymentTotal(java.math.BigDecimal amount,

                                         java.math.MathContext mathContext)
        Calculates the total amount of a loan payment on the given date
